metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3825 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: mm-video-v4l2/vidc/venc/src/omx_video_base.cpp in mediaserver in Android5.0.x before 5.0.2, 5.1.x before 5.1.1, and 6.x before 2016-08-01 allocatesan incorrect amount of memory, which allows attackers to gain privilegesvia a crafted application, aka internal bug 28816964.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
